headline.print_headline: U.S. Orders Mandatory Inspections for F-35s After Engine Issue
headline.main: U.S. Orders Mandatory Inspections for F-35s After Engine Issue

docs.snippet: The U.S. military has ordered mandatory inspections of all Lockheed Martin Corp F-35 fighter jets before further flights after a Marine Corps F-35B model suffered an in-flight emergency last week, a Pentagon spokesman said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. military has ordered mandatory inspections of all Lockheed Martin Corp F-35 fighter jets before further flights after a Marine Corps F-35B model suffered an in-flight emergency last week, a Pentagon spokesman said on Sunday.

headline.sub: Francois Hollande roots for France as they take on Honduras
headline.main: Francois Hollande roots for France as they take on Honduras

docs.snippet: French President Francois Hollande sported a suit and tie to cheer on France as they beat Honduras 3-0 in the World Cup.  Rough Cut (no reporter narration)...
docs.lead_paragraph: French President Francois Hollande sported a suit and tie to cheer on France as they beat Honduras 3-0 in the World Cup.  Rough Cut (no reporter narration)

headline.print_headline: Colombia's Zuluaga Concedes Defeat to Santos in Presidential Race
headline.main: Colombia's Zuluaga Concedes Defeat to Santos in Presidential Race

docs.snippet: Colombia's right-wing challenger Oscar Ivan Zuluaga conceded defeat to President Juan Manuel Santos who won a second mandate in Sunday's presidential election, in which he has vowed to conclude a peace process he launched with Marxist FARC rebels....
docs.lead_paragraph: Colombia's right-wing challenger Oscar Ivan Zuluaga conceded defeat to President Juan Manuel Santos who won a second mandate in Sunday's presidential election, in which he has vowed to conclude a peace process he launched with Marxist FARC rebels.

headline.print_headline: Daley Blind Focused on World Cup Not Transfer
headline.main: Daley Blind Focused on World Cup Not Transfer

docs.snippet: Daley Blind apparently is so wrapped up in the World Cup that Father's Day passed him by....
docs.lead_paragraph: Daley Blind apparently is so wrapped up in the World Cup that Father's Day passed him by.

headline.print_headline: Messi Strike Delights; French, Swiss Win Too
headline.main: Messi Strike Delights; French, Swiss Win Too

docs.snippet: A breathtaking last-gasp goal; a first for goal-line technology; happy and cheering fans. What else could the World Cup want? Oh yes, a stunning goal by Lionel Messi for Argentina at the Maracana stadium in Rio de Janeiro....
docs.lead_paragraph: A breathtaking last-gasp goal; a first for goal-line technology; happy and cheering fans. What else could the World Cup want? Oh yes, a stunning goal by Lionel Messi for Argentina at the Maracana stadium in Rio de Janeiro.

headline.print_headline: Biden to Meet Central America Leaders About Child Migrant Wave
headline.main: Biden to Meet Central America Leaders About Child Migrant Wave

docs.snippet: U.S. Vice President Joe Biden will go to Guatemala on Friday to meet Central American leaders about the influx of unaccompanied minors illegally entering the United States, senior administration officials said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Vice President Joe Biden will go to Guatemala on Friday to meet Central American leaders about the influx of unaccompanied minors illegally entering the United States, senior administration officials said on Sunday.

docs.snippet: Every team plays in distinct ways. To understand their style, one must learn a bit about each country’s history....

headline.print_headline: Price Strikes Out 10, Rays Top Creative Astros 4-3
headline.main: Price Strikes Out 10, Rays Top Creative Astros 4-3

docs.snippet: David Price shook off a tough start to strike out 10, pinch-hitter Jerry Sands broke three bats while singling home the go-ahead run in the eighth inning and the Tampa Bay Rays beat the creative Houston Astros 4-3 Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: David Price shook off a tough start to strike out 10, pinch-hitter Jerry Sands broke three bats while singling home the go-ahead run in the eighth inning and the Tampa Bay Rays beat the creative Houston Astros 4-3 Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Langdon Wins NHRA Thunder Valley Nationals
headline.main: Langdon Wins NHRA Thunder Valley Nationals

docs.snippet: Defending Top Fuel champion Shawn Langdon raced to his first victory of the season Sunday, beating points leader Doug Kalitta in the NHRA Thunder Valley Nationals....
docs.lead_paragraph: Defending Top Fuel champion Shawn Langdon raced to his first victory of the season Sunday, beating points leader Doug Kalitta in the NHRA Thunder Valley Nationals.

headline.print_headline: Rooney's Role Under Scrutiny After World Cup Loss
headline.main: Rooney's Role Under Scrutiny After World Cup Loss

docs.snippet: As so often with England, a setback on the pitch has provoked renewed scrutiny of Wayne Rooney's contribution. Or lack of it....
docs.lead_paragraph: As so often with England, a setback on the pitch has provoked renewed scrutiny of Wayne Rooney's contribution. Or lack of it.
